The subject line says it all, and as you can imagine I've got a really
good reason to be doing something like this - beyond it just being the
middle of summer and too quiet.

Shipping, of course, is extra, at my cost. If you live in Illinois I
have to charge 10% sales tax.

Call or email if you have questions. I have some additional inventory
lined up to upload, so check back during the weekend under 'new
arrivals' or ask if there's something you're looking for that doesn't
show up in a search on the website.

Thanks in advance for your support,

Craig
